resources.string: Email wasn\'t registered. Please sign up.
Greetings, Merkadian! A prime market stall has just become available, and it\'s calling your name! Claim it now, start your shop, and pave your way to success!

Greetings, Merkadian! Your old market stall is still available and calling you back! Claiming it now will temporarily close your factory. Weigh your options and choose the path that best fits your town\'s needs!
You\'re not selling any%s. Add some!
